gaps: No explicit tests for authorization beyond missing header (e.g., invalid tokens)
No tests for pagination or handling large datasets beyond payload size
No rate limiting or throttling tests
No caching behavior tests (ETag, Cache-Control headers)
No explicit concurrency control tests beyond basic concurrent requests
No tests for soft delete or recovery scenarios
No explicit tests for handling malformed or unexpected input formats beyond invalid data
No tests for handling duplicate requests or idempotency checks
recommendations: Add tests for authorization scenarios, including invalid or expired tokens
Include pagination tests if the API supports listing accounts with large datasets
Implement rate limiting and throttling tests to verify system stability under load
Add scenarios to verify caching headers and cache invalidation behavior
Create concurrency tests to ensure data consistency during simultaneous updates
Test for soft delete or recovery if applicable
Include more malformed input tests, such as wrong data types or corrupted payloads
Add idempotency tests to verify repeated requests do not cause unintended side effects
